original_text: Then the angel who spoke to Cornelius went away. Cornelius told two of his servants and a soldier of his group to come to him. The soldier was one of those who served Cornelius. He was a good man who obeyed God.
korean_text: 마침 말하던 천사가 떠나매 고넬료가 집안 하인 둘과 부하 가운데 경건한 사람 하나를 불러

sentences.original_text: Then the angel who spoke to Cornelius went away.
Cornelius told two of his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 고넬료는 자신의 종 두 명에게 명령했습니다.

sentences.original_text: and a soldier of his group
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 그룹의 한 군인에게도 명령했습니다.

sentences.original_text: The soldier was one of those who served Cornelius.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 군인은 고넬료를 섬기던 사람 중 한 명이었습니다.
